subject: Languages
title: Celtic: Europe's Fading Voice
description: One-minute skill: Celtic: Europe's Fading Voice.

hook.text: Celtic languages once covered most of Western Europe. Today, they survive in just a few coastal corners.

buildup.text: Before Roman expansion, Celtic was spoken from Turkey to Ireland, from Spain to Scotland.

discovery.text: Latin, Germanic invasions, and English colonialism pushed Celtic to the western fringes over 2,000 years.

punchline.text: Celtic once ruled a continent. Now it clings to a few Atlantic shores.
